translations.signInPage.resetPasswordText: Enter your email and we’ll send you a link to reset password.
translations.signInPage.emailSent: An email with your username has been sent
translations.signInPage.otpSent: An OTP has been sent to your email. Please check your inbox for the password reset link.
translations.signInPage.emailNotArrive: If the email does not arrive soon, check your spam folder. It was sent to forgotpassword@montypay.com
